analysis.key_quote: This order wrongly applies employment rules for political appointees and at-will workers to career staff; deprives federal employees of due process rights that they were promised when they were hired; and ignores Office of Personnel Management regulations.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the erosion of due process rights and the potential for politicization of the civil service, which aligns with the themes of merit-based system concerns and employee rights.
